Attribute.AttributeName: System.Obsolete("The System.Web.Mobile.dll assembly has been deprecated and should no longer be used. For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=157231.")

summary.span: 提供使用户可以输入文本的基于文本的控件。

span.span: Provides a text-based control that allows the user to enter text.

summary.span: 若要了解如何开发 ASP.NET 移动应用，请参阅 ASP.NET 移动应用和网站。

span.span: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see Mobile Apps & Sites with ASP.NET.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 允许仅单行文本输入。The allows only single-line text input. 此控件还实现接口; 它可以接受输入并生成回发。This control also implements the interface; it can accept input and generate postbacks. 与使用 WML 设备，但是，输入的数据可能会不发布回服务器。With devices using WML, however, entered data might not post back to the server. 当用户在文本框中输入值时，这些值存储在属性，它继承自基类。When the user enters values in a text box, the values are stored in the property, which is inherited from the base class. > [!NOTE] > 一个接受用户输入，这是潜在的安全威胁。A accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 默认情况下，ASP.NET 移动 Web 窗体页面验证用户输入不包括脚本或 HTML 元素。By default, ASP.NET Mobile Web Forms pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 有关详细信息，请参阅[脚本侵入概述](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07)。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07).

permission.span: 用于在宿主环境中进行操作。

span.span: for operating in a hosted environment.
Demand value: ; Permission value: .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法首先尝试调用方法所引用对象。The method first attempts to call the method on the object referenced by . 如果该适配器具有 post 数据加载到该控件没有特定于设备的实现，该调用返回`false`和方法然后测试所引用的对象的值`data`处指定参数`key`针对。If the adapter has no device-specific implementation for loading the post data into the control, that call returns `false` and the method then tests the value of the object referenced by the `data` parameter at the specified `key` against . 如果值不相等，设置新值。If the values are not equal, the new value is set. 如果任何一个尝试加载已发布的数据，通过适配器或直接在被更改的数据中的结果会发生。If either attempt to load the posted data, whether through the adapter or directly, results in the data being changed, a will occur.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 并非所有的标记语言支持全部是数字的用户输入的使用。Not all markup languages support the use of fully numeric user input. 例如，HTML 不支持此属性。For example, HTML does not support this property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 星号是典型的字符用于屏蔽密码。An asterisk is a typical character that is used to mask a password. > [!NOTE] > 设置属性设为 true 不会加密或其他传输期间保护密码字符串。Setting the property to true does not encrypt or otherwise protect the password string during transmission.

summary.span: 获取或设置指定文本框的预期长度（以字符为单位）。

span.span: Gets or sets the expected length of the specified text box, in characters.

summary.span: 文本框大小的默认值为 0，表示浏览器将使用其默认文本框长度。

span.span: The default value for the size of a text box is 0, which means that the browser will use its default text box length.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此信息不用于执行验证检查实际输入值。This information is not used to perform validation checks against the actual input value. 若要执行对输入值的验证检查，请使用验证程序控件或属性。To perform a validation check against an input value, use the validator controls or the property. 此信息用于确定呈现行为。This information does determine the rendering behavior. 例如，此属性的值可帮助确定在 HTML 中进行输入的文本框的大小。For example, the value of this property helps determine how large to make an input text box in HTML.

span.span: The value is less than zero.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当用户更改的文本，不会立即引发此事件。When the user changes the text of a , this event is not raised immediately. 该窗体必须包含以启动回发事件引发事件。The form must contain a to initiate a postback event that raises the event. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用事件以更改中的项。The following example demonstrates how to use the event to change the items in a .
